content: materials drops safran or muskat from garnstudio each cuddly toy weighs less than 50 g use remains and choose the colors you wish see pictures for suggestions drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c for safran or 3 5 mm/e for muskat accessories poly stuffing for filling **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=30
